name: Woven Words
summary:
The Woven Words puzzle grids come in all different shapes and sizes, and when you’re done every row and every column will spell out complete words! Each game board is a mix of letters and blank tiles.
Can you find the right letters for the blank tiles so that every line spells a word both down and across?
The free app includes 6 basic puzzles so you can get your feet wet – and then 12 more challenging puzzles to test your skills. In addition, over five hundred more puzzles are available for purchase.
We’ve worked hard to make Woven Words fully accessible with VoiceOver.
